name: Danielle Crampsie
bio: A firm believer in quality over quantity Danielle wants the jewellery she creates to last a long time, so long that it becomes a family heirloom and a reflection of our time. Working with the newest technology while preserving the traditional skills of her trade Danielle helps people express their individuality, write their personal story, and solidify it in history. Her efforts have won her recognition from the Rosen Group’s Niche Awards, Toronto Design Exchange, Art Buzz, Ontario Arts Council, Woman’s Mining Association and the Birk’s Family.
